1.0.name: wordpress/iplocationtools-real-time-visitor-widget
1.0.description:
IPLocationTools displays the real-time visitors that currently visiting your blog site. It displays you the information of where the visitors coming from (city, region and country) and also the visiting time - by using the geo location technology powered by IP2Location.

This plugin does not requires you to set up the database for geo location's information retrieval. It will be remotely done from our server. Hence, by having this plugin, you can enjoy the cool feature yet free and hasle solution.

The appearance of this plugin is configurable via the plugin's settings page. This enables you to custom the display to best suit your blog's theme.
